property.name: obo.ontology.description
property.value: The Plant Ontology (PO) is a community resource consisting of standardized terms, definitions, and logical relations describing plant structures and development stages, augmented by a large database of annotations from genomic and phenomic studies.

property.name: obo.ontology.description
property.value: A controlled vocabulary of describe phenotypic traits in plants.

property.name: obo.ontology.description
property.value: Chemical Entities of Biological Interest (ChEBI) is a freely available dictionary of molecular entities focused on ‘small’ chemical compounds.
